title: Send the Perfect Gift Card Your Way, Anytime!
customCardsCaption: Create a custom gift card for your loved ones
giftCardsCaption: Choose a gift card from our wide collection
sec2Title: Our Commitment to Quality and Customer Satisfaction
sec2Caption: We provide top-quality gift cards and a seamless experience, from design selection to timely delivery. Customer satisfaction is our priority, and we're here to assist with any inquiries. Enjoy personalized service that makes every occasion special.
sec3Caption: We offer a wide range of gift cards that suit all tastes and occasions. We also offer the possibility of creating a custom gift card with your own design and text.
loginTitle: Hello! Welcome back to Give A Gift
name: Name
nameValidation1: Name should be at min 3 char
nameValidation2: Name should be at max 20 char
passwordValidation3: Must contain at least one uppercase character
passwordValidation4: Must contain at least one lowercase character
passwordValidation5: Must contain at least one number
